## Public Member Functions

### trackStatistics() {#a9dad5027fab5ac60b96e07942d265310}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;AttributorAttributes.cpp&#125;::AANoRecurseFunction::trackStatistics () const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Hook to enable custom statistic tracking, called after manifest that resulted in a change if statistics are enabled.

We require subclasses to provide an implementation so we remember to add statistics for them.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/attributorattributes-cpp/#l02876">2876</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/attributorattributes-cpp">AttributorAttributes.cpp</a>.
